metadata.title: CVE-2022-3964 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in ffmpeg. Thisaffects an unknown part of the file libavcodec/rpzaenc.c of the componentQuickTime RPZA Video Encoder. The manipulation of the argument y_size leadsto out-of-bounds read. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. Thename of the patch is 92f9b28ed84a77138105475beba16c146bdaf984. It isrecommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifierof this vulnerability is VDB-213543.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
